string.text: Retrieve a set of gunsmith tools for Hog so he can perform basic upgrades to your equipment.
Do you need any upgrades done to your gear? I can do some if you want to pick up a set of gunsmith tools I have stashed away.
Excellent, thanks. Bring me your gear if you want me to do any basic upgrades for you.
Search for a set of technician tools for Hog so he can perform advanced upgrades to your gear.
Want to try to find some technician's tools for me? If you can find some I'll be able to perform more advanced upgrades on your gear. I'll show you a place where you might be able to find some.
Ah, great, you found some. Just what I needed. Let me know if you would like me to do any advanced upgrades to your gear.
Bandits have stolen a set of armorer's tools from a Military depot. Find them and capture the tools for Hog so he can perform expert upgrades on your equipment.

I got some intel that a small group of Bandits broke into a Military supply depot and made off with a set of armorer's tools. They're still on the loose; if you can find them before the Military does, get those tools and bring them to me. With a set of tools like that I'll be able to do almost any type of upgrade to your equipment.
Great job, these are some sweet tools. Let me know if you need any work done, I'll be able to perform almost any type of equipment upgrades now.
